wobani.resources.texture

Interface Texture

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Resource
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CubeMapTexture, EasyFiltering, Texture2D
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractTexture, DynamicCubeMapTexture, DynamicTexture, DynamicTexture2D, StaticCubeMapTexture, StaticTexture, StaticTexture2D

    public interface Texture
extends Resource
    Base interface for all types of textures.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Texture filter type.

      Texture wrap mode.
      static class  Texture.TextureWrapDirection
      Texture wrap direction.
